file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 27-12-03-06 - AILERON DAMPER - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL AILERON DAMPER - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: POST-MOD S.B. 145-27-0063 OR FA/CTA-CERTIFIED AIRCRAFT 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to do the inspection on the aileron damper rod ends/fitting lugs. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY POST-MOD S.B. 145-27-0063 OR FA/ AILERON DAMPER ROD ENDS/FITTING 27-12-03-200-801-A ♦ CTA-CERTIFIED AIR- LUGS - INSPECTION CRAFT EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 27-12-03 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 27-12-03-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: POST-MOD S.B. 145-27-0063 OR FA/CTA-CERTIFIED AIRCRAFT 2. AILERON DAMPER ROD ENDS/FITTING LUGS - INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to do the inspection on the aileron damper rod ends/fitting lugs for integrity and general condition. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 27-12-03-000-801-A/400 AILERON DAMPER - REMOVAL HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-801-A/200 HTS C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Flashlight For the damper lighting 1 available Commercially To do an inspection in the aileron damper Inspection Mirror 1 available rod end and the spherical bearing F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Wing I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Do not do other tasks on the aileron system. (2) Release the pressure of the hydraulic system AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-801-A/200. (3) On the Flight Control Panel, push the sys1 and sys2 aileron shutoff pushbuttons. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 27-12-03 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Inspection (Visual Inspection) of Aileron Damper Rod Ends/Fitting Lugs for Integrity and General Condition (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A WARNING: DO NOT PUT YOUR FINGERS OR OTHER MATERIAL IN THE SPACE BETWEEN THE WING AND AILERON. NOTE: You can do the task better if you use a flashlight and a mirror to inspect the aileron damper. (1) Manually deflect the aileron up until you can see the damper. (2) During the movement, look to make sure that the wing support holds the damper. (3) Look to make sure that the aileron support holds the damper. (4) Examine the rod end for deformation, cracks, dents, or other types of damage. (5) Inspect the spherical bearing for correct installation in the rod end. (6) If a repair is necessary, do AMM TASK 27-12-03-000-801-A/400. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the Flight Control Panel, release sys1 and sys2 aileron shutoff pushbuttons. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 27-12-03 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

ROD END SPHERICAL BEARING WINE SUPPORT DAMPER BOLT DET. B AILERON SUPPORT (REF.) USE A MIRROR AND A FLASHLIGHT TO INSPECT THE ROD END AND THE SPHERICAL BEARING.
